new_customer.description: A customer who has never used the service before
new_customer.approach: Educate about the service, build trust

repeat_customer.description: A customer who has used the service before and is familiar with the process

urgent_customer.description: A customer who needs the service urgently

luxury_customer.description: A customer who seeks premium services

corporate_customer.description: A customer booking for a business or corporate event

needs_assessment.description: Understanding the customer's needs and preferences

solution_proposal.description: Proposing a suitable appointment or service

greeting.template: Hello {customer_name}, how can I assist you today?

needs_assessment.template: Could you please tell me more about what you're looking for?

appointment_proposal.template: We have an available slot on {date} at {time}. Would that work for you?

appointment_confirmation.template: Great, I've booked your appointment for {date} at {time}.

rescheduling_proposal.template: I'm sorry for the inconvenience. Can we reschedule your appointment to {date} at {time}?
rescheduling_proposal.use_case: When original appointment can't be met

discount_offer.template: As a valued customer, we'd like to offer you a {discount}% discount on your next booking.
discount_offer.use_case: When dealing with repeat or budget customers

premium_option.template: We also offer a premium service which includes {premium_features}. Would you be interested in that?

immediate_solution.template: We can arrange a service for you right away. Would that be suitable?

loyalty_rewards.template: As a thank you for your loyalty, we'd like to offer you {reward}.

tailored_solution.template: We can offer a tailored solution to meet your business needs. Would you like to discuss this further?

descriptions.interest: Customer's interest level in the product/service
descriptions.urgency: Customer's urgency to make a decision
descriptions.trust: Customer's trust level in the salesperson/company
